Points.Objects2: SETONTHIS/freerun/true:MX=1:SB=1:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=#XY,5699,391,53 ; static,6464/name/an unstable powder keg/movable/true/weight/200/visible/false/ATTACH/<xmlmessage,This keg looks pretty explosive...,20>/ATTACH/<xmluse/successaction/@SENDMSG/This powder appears unstable and explosive. Perhaps the one who made it knows how to set it off intentionally.>:MX=1:SB=2:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=SETONSPAWN,2/visible/true:MX=1:SB=3:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=SETONTHIS/ATTACH/<xmlvalue,kegserial,{GETONSPAWN,2,serial}>:MX=1:SB=3:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=WAITUNTIL/GETONSPAWN,2,COUNT=0:MX=2:SB=3:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=SET,{GETONTHIS,[ATTACHMENT,xmlvalue,kegserial,value]},static/MSG/The keg shakes as you move it... it looks like it could blow up any minute!:MX=1:SB=4:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=WAITUNTIL,1:MX=1:SB=5:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=SET,{GETONTHIS,[ATTACHMENT,xmlvalue,kegserial,value]},static/MSG/The keg appears to be getting even more unstable!:MX=1:SB=6:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=WAITUNTIL, 1:MX=1:SB=7:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=SET,{GETONTHIS,[ATTACHMENT,xmlvalue,kegserial,value]},static/MSG/You would guess that you have about a minute before this blows up!:MX=1:SB=8:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=WAITUNTIL, 1:MX=1:SB=9:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=SET,{GETONTHIS,[ATTACHMENT,xmlvalue,kegserial,value]},static/MSG/And BOOM goes the dynamite...:MX=1:SB=10:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=SET,{GETONTHIS,[ATTACHMENT,xmlvalue,kegserial,value]},static/DAMAGE,20,30,2/EFFECT,14000,25/DELETE:MX=1:SB=11:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=SETONTHIS/freerun/false:MX=1:SB=20:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0
